Certain NSAID modify generation ROS stimulate neutrophil range form increase production reduce production . Preliminary experiment laboratory show different NSAIDs opposing effect ability leukocytes ( granulocyte monocyte ) produce ROS upon standardized stimulus , i.e . phorbol myristate acetate ( PMA ) . An inhibitory effect paracetamol also see examine platelet activation marker , whereas acetylsalicylic acid show clear enhance effect respect . We want examine intake paracetamol ibuprofen vivo similar effect leukocyte ROS production platelet activation , respectively .
